name: mongodb-named-queries-explorer
description: A dynamic MongoDB data exploration tool

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: docker-compose up -d && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules && rm -rf frontend/dist backend/dist
